OrgName.entry: BINSTEAD AND COOKSON TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Works with South Yorkshire Police and Sheffield Homes to improve the environment, remove fear of crime, keep people informed and provide them with a voice. Aims to create a community feeling, to encourage groups and individuals to use facilities in Cookson Park and encourage achievement and confidence in all residents. Supports and is involved with Southey Development Forum. Organises trips and summer playschemes for children.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: 1st Tues in the month (liaison meetings with Sheffield Homes), occasional public meetings

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 5
